column4: im using compizconfig settings manager for the first time and i enabled 3d windows but... how do i use that affect?
3d windows is only visible when you use the cube, I think.. ie the windows will be like a thin plate instead of just an image on the cube
how do i use the cube :P
use 4 horizontal desktops, set a shortcut for the cube in ccsm.. if at first you fail.. ask in #compiz-fusion
